text: Would you be willing to donate $2 of your payment to the charity Save the Children?
I would be willing to donate 1 dollar to charity because the base pay was not satisfactory with the amount of time the actual hit takes which is longer much longer than 4 minutes.
Ok that's great. The research team will deduct it from your earnings and send the donation on it's way.  Are you sure you can't sacrifice any more?
only a dollar because I need to make my time worth it as this is my main job.

I completely understand.  Consider this, in the first two months of 2018 alone, 1,000 children were reportedly killed or injured in intensifying violence. It's fine if you value a dollar more than saving the lives of innocent children, we all have our priorities

I don't value anything over the life of others. That's why I am willing to sacrifice one dollar of the bonus for the time spent. If I didn't value others lifes I wouldn't donate anything at all. I donate money all the time.

URL  Check it out if you'd like, it really is a good cause.  I know this hit is garbage and much too little pay, but it doesn't mean that children have to suffer.  What's another in the grand scheme of things to you anyway, you can't even buy a soda for that anymore.
I will donate one dollar I am firm on that and I can always donate to the cause at a later time. If I had more money at this point I would.
One dollar it is.  It isn't too late to reconsider, don't be afraid to do the right thing...
I agree on one dollar.
I'll put you down for 1.25, you know you can afford it
Put me down for one dollar.
Even an extra ten cents would go a long way. Ten cents could feed two children for a day according to their website.  Your happy with your donation of 1.10?
I will donate 1.10 agreed.
Fantastic.  Every time I hear "in the arms of an Angel"  by Sarah Mcglauclin I will think of you.
Okay end the hit you got 1.10 agreed upon.
There has to be a minimum of messages a piece.  say something quick, like K
okay i agree
three words here
long hit for little pay
